title: Churn rate of Spotify worldwide 2017 to 2018
summary: The statistic shows the Churn of rate in Spotify 2017 and 2018 .
In 2018 , there were a total of 19.8 % rate in Spotify .
gold: The cumulative subscriber churn rate of Spotify worldwide amounted to 19.8 percent in 2018 , up from 18.1 percent in the previous year.

The source noted that this is partially due to promotional trials - whilst such trials draw in new subscribers , many of whom tend to convert , Spotify counts paid trialists in its subscriber numbers , meaning that those who do not convert then become churned subscribers .
